name: Snake Warrior
description:
Snake Warrior is inspired by the classic game, Snake. It starts just like a normal snake game but it ivolves into a difficult but fun setting, with tanks and enemies. It's the first stage of the game and there will be added a lot more cool features.

Feel free to leave opinions, report bugs and even ideas how to improve the game. I will be thankful to hear criticism about the game if needed

How To Play:

To move: Use A , D or  Left key, Right key

To shoot: space or left mouse click. Note: you can shoot only from a certain level

Eat apples to grow, eat other fruits to gain different abilities.
